original_text: And the king gave a great banquet, Esther’s banquet, for all his nobles and officials. He proclaimed a holiday throughout the provinces and distributed gifts with royal liberality.
korean_text: 왕이 크게 잔치를 베푸니 이는 에스더를 위한 잔치라 모든 지방관과 신하들을 위하여 잔치를 베풀고 또 각 지방의 세금을 면제하고 왕의 이름으로 큰 상을 주니라

sentences.original_text: And the king gave a great banquet
for all his nobles and officials
He proclaimed a holiday throughout the provinces
and distributed gifts with royal liberality
